page.title: 10POPULATION
page.content: The population is thinly spread out through the area.The major{village} on the north side is{Rodley}where the population in and around the village is between{150-200}.There are not,however,many young people living there.The area caters mainly for the older generation who come for peace and quiet or those who are local farmers.The average age seems to be 35-40. The area to the south of the River has a similar population,approximately 150-200.Again it consists mainly of the over-40's.The population does seem to have been very stable over the last few years,however,since those who have moved away to urban areas have been replaced by families moving into the area to find peace and quiet away from the towns and cities.
